page.title: 01Civic Centre
page.content:
The civic centre is a 10 storey modern building overlooking the town centre. It was opened in{May 1975 by H.M. the {Queen Mother. { About 1500 people are employed within the centre, which was built on the site of the old education offices.
Many playschemes & holiday clubs are organised by the Parks Dept. and run throughout the school holidays. The playschemes are open to all children without charge and provide a range of sports, recreation, arts & crafts activities organised & supervised by part-time play leaders. Holiday clubs provide a more formally structured programme of activities for which charges are made. Attendances at these schemes throughout the year are expected to exceed 80,000.
